thread.title: Watch: Stage Production A7X Said Would Blow You Away Makes Live Debut [News]
thread.title_full: Watch: Stage Production A7X Said Would Blow You Away Makes Live Debut [News]

title: Watch: Stage Production A7X Said Would Blow You Away Makes Live Debut [News]
text: UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 16 hours ago 5 On January 7 in Dublin, Ireland, Avenged Sevenfold have debuted their latest stage production, marking the beginning of their European run with Disturbed and In Flames.As reported, the new stage sees the band collaborating with producers of Cirque Du Soleil.M. Shadows previously told Metal Hammer: "The production that's being built is different for us, different for anyone I've ever seen, the people we've hired don't do tours, they do Cirque Du Soleil."Additionally, the boys said they're confident the new production will blow people away. You can check out some fan-filmed footage below.
